purpose: The email announces a tenure track position for an Associate Senior Lecturer in AI for Software Engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology in Karlskrona, Sweden. The position involves research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering, with a focus on using and developing AI to enhance software development processes. Candidates should have experience in both quantitative and qualitative research, as well as tool development for software data analysis. The role includes a guaranteed research proportion of at least 60% and resources to finance one doctoral student. The application deadline is August 1, 2025.
